label: AB4C_tP12_137_a_g_b-001
title: Low Temperature KBD$_{4}$ Structure
comments: This is the low temperature structure of KBD$_{4}$, stable below 70K, with data taken at 1.5K.  Above that it transforms into the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB8C_cF40_225_a_f_b-001}{cubic room temperature KBD$_{4}$ structure}, also known as the NaBH$_{4}$ structure.
